reviewText:
DO NOT BUY.
Game length is seriously 3 Min gameplay time. I'm not joking.
This game pretend to has a Story and acts like survival game. But actually It has none of them.
Since Game has only 3 quest. and which can beat in 3 min,
hunger system is totally useless. you beat the 3 quest and game is over.

*Clap Clap. I usally able to see game's true aspect (sucked game or not sucked game) through trailer and description.
I failed this time.
Well played.

reviewText: If you liked other survival games such as Don't Starve, I reccomend getting this game. It'll really make you appreciate those games.

reviewText:
4/5
It's a fun game all about surviving for as many night's as you can and escaping.
I found it very satisfying everytime i survived 1 more day then last round.
however there are a lot of glitchs but, it give a fun facter everytime u do something, I also feel like it will need more updates so it doesn't get stale.
but for the price its definitely worth it!

reviewText: verry fun game! i had a lot of fun playing. some times it can be a bit confuising and i didnt know what was what but my advoce is that there is a way to do it and so read the instructions agen and you will find how to do it. it is qite dificult but defenitly worth the mony and i would recomend it to my freand. it also has very nice graficts and i know it is persinal prefrence but i like the art stile and piculated feal. the long and short of it is that i do like the game a lot!

reviewText:
You know that thing you get in 3d games where you have a detailed object with crisp textures laying on a blobbish texel smear of some large-scale background? This is that, in a 2D game. Every sprite has a different DPI on screen, it feels like.

Also the text apparently only looked good on the original testing resolution; it scales badly.

Retro or low-quality" art is fine
date: just see undertale or nidhogg. The random inconsistancy is what kills it.\n\nThe controls are kinda sticky
recommended: at least in switching to movement to the right.\n\nI didn't get much past the stew
hoursPlayed: but other reviews seem to indicate that I've already seen about half the game. Short games are fine
voteText: but...\n\nThe writing is also slightly off. Not bad-bad
helpfulPercent: but if you're putting something up for sale... try to get someone with at least a slight college level expereince in proofing and copyediting to go over it -- someone who didn't write it. Given the amount of text between the game
votesFunny:
I'd guess that's maybe a half hour's work.

The less text you have the more important it is to get it right.

All in all it looks like a good first finished game project from a new dev
commentsCount: but I just keep asking myself

reviewText:
I usually don't like to write negative reviews, but this is a special something:
*) ♥♥♥♥♥♥ controls
*) no content
*) insulting interface

This game ♥♥♥♥♥ the survival genre.
